The Spark

It all started on a crisp Monday morning in October 2025. I was sitting in my AI & Data Science lecture at Amrutvahini College of Engineering, frantically flipping through my notebook trying to figure out which class I had next. That's when it hit me â€“ why are we still using paper timetables in the age of AI?

ğŸ¯

The Challenge

As students, we juggled multiple schedules, last-minute changes, and holiday notifications. I noticed my classmates struggling with the same problem â€“ missing important announcements, forgetting which teacher taught which subject, and constantly asking "What's next?" in the WhatsApp group.

ğŸš€

The Solution

We decided to build TimeZen â€“ not just another timetable app, but a complete education companion. Team ZenSpace spent countless nights coding, designing, and testing together. Our classmates became our first beta testers, and their feedback shaped every feature you see today. From the bold neubrutalism design to the intuitive timeline view, every pixel tells a story of our collaborative late-night debugging sessions and endless cups of chai.

âœ¨

The Vision

TimeZen is more than an app â€“ it's a movement to make education tracking seamless and beautiful. Built by students, for students. Every feature addresses real problems we faced in our daily college life. Today, it serves hundreds of students across all divisions at Amrutvahini, helping them stay organized and never miss a beat.
